headline: Stocks to Watch Recap: Fair Isaac, Tesla, Stellantis, Netflix
summary: ↗️ Fair Isaac (FICO): The credit-analytics company said it would license its scores used for assessing mortgage borrowers' creditworthiness, allowing resellers to bypass credit bureaus. Fair Isaac stock jumped 18%.

content.title: Stocks to Watch Recap: Fair Isaac, Tesla, Stellantis, Netflix
content.summary: ↗️ Fair Isaac (FICO): The credit-analytics company said it would license its scores used for assessing mortgage borrowers' creditworthiness, allowing resellers to bypass credit bureaus. Fair Isaac stock jumped 18%.

headline: Buffett Scores Win in Berkshire’s Deal for Occidental Chemicals Unit
summary: Score one for Warren Buffett at the expense of  Occidental Petroleum  CEO Vicki Hollub.  It looks like Buffett’s  Berkshire Hathaway  got the better of Occidental Petroleum in its purchase of the energy company’s chemical business for $9.7 billion in cash, announced earlier Thursday.  Occidental shares fell 7.1% to $44.32, against a 1% drop in the  exchange-traded fund.

It looks like Buffett’s  Berkshire Hathaway  got the better of Occidental Petroleum in its purchase of the energy company’s chemical business for $9.7 billion in cash, announced earlier Thursday.  Occidental shares fell 7.1% to $44.32, against a 1% drop in the  exchange-traded fund.

headline: Buffett's Berkshire Is Making Its Biggest Acquisition in Years—What You Need to Know
summary: Berkshire Hathaway struck a $9.7 billion all-cash deal to buy OxyChem, the petrochemical division of Occidental Petroleum, in the largest acquisition by Warren Buffett’s conglomerate since 2022.

content.summary: Berkshire Hathaway struck a $9.7 billion all-cash deal to buy OxyChem, the petrochemical division of Occidental Petroleum, in the largest acquisition by Warren Buffett’s conglomerate since 2022.

thumbnail.caption: Julie Bang / Investopedia The 95-year-old Warren Buffett is stepping down as Berkshire Hathaway's CEO at the end of the year.

headline: Berkshire Hathaway to Buy OxyChem From Occidental for $9.7 Billion. Occidental Stock Falls.
summary: Berkshire Hathaway  agreed to acquire  Occidental Petroleum’s  chemical division, OxyChem, in a $9.7 billion, all-cash transaction.  Oil-and-gas producer Occidental is striving to reduce debt following its acquisitions of Anadarko Petroleum and CrownRock in 2019 and 2023, respectively.  Occidental said Thursday it expects to use $6.5 billion of the proceeds from the transaction to achieve its target level of principal debt below $15 billion.

content.title: Berkshire Hathaway to Buy OxyChem From Occidental for $9.7 Billion. Occidental Stock Falls.
content.summary: Berkshire Hathaway  agreed to acquire  Occidental Petroleum’s  chemical division, OxyChem, in a $9.7 billion, all-cash transaction.  Oil-and-gas producer Occidental is striving to reduce debt following its acquisitions of Anadarko Petroleum and CrownRock in 2019 and 2023, respectively.  Occidental said Thursday it expects to use $6.5 billion of the proceeds from the transaction to achieve its target level of principal debt below $15 billion.

headline: Warren Buffett Just Played Both Sides Of $9.7 Billion Berkshire Hathaway Deal
summary: Warren Buffett's $9.7 billion acquisition of OxyChem from Occidental Petroleum was what you might call an interfamily negotiation.  Buffett's biggest deal since 2021 and perhaps his last big deal as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway came with Berkshire's sixth-largest equity holding on the other side of the table.  Berkshire's latest disclosures show that it owned nearly 265 million shares of Occidental Petroleum at the end of Q2, giving Buffett a roughly 27% stake.

content.title: Warren Buffett Just Played Both Sides Of $9.7 Billion Berkshire Hathaway Deal
content.summary: Warren Buffett's $9.7 billion acquisition of OxyChem from Occidental Petroleum was what you might call an interfamily negotiation.  Buffett's biggest deal since 2021 and perhaps his last big deal as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway came with Berkshire's sixth-largest equity holding on the other side of the table.  Berkshire's latest disclosures show that it owned nearly 265 million shares of Occidental Petroleum at the end of Q2, giving Buffett a roughly 27% stake.

headline: Berkshire Hathaway to pay $9.7 billion for OxyChem, potentially Warren Buffett's last big deal
summary: Berkshire Hathaway is buying Occidental Petroleum's chemical division for $9.7 billion in what may be the last big acquisition involving the consummate dealmaker, Warren Buffett.  Buffett wasn’t mentioned anywhere in materials released by Berkshire Hathaway discussing the deal Thursday, potentially signaling a passing of the torch to Vice Chair Greg Abel, to whom Buffett will hand the CEO title in January.

content.title: Berkshire Hathaway to pay $9.7 billion for OxyChem, potentially Warren Buffett's last big deal

Buffett wasn’t mentioned anywhere in materials released by Berkshire Hathaway discussing the deal Thursday, potentially signaling a passing of the torch to Vice Chair Greg Abel, to whom Buffett will hand the CEO title in January.

headline: Occidental Promotes Richard A. Jackson to Senior Vice President and Chief Operating Officer
summary: HOUSTON, Oct. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Occidental (NYSE: OXY) announced today that its Board of Directors has promoted Richard A. Jackson to Senior Vice President and Chief Operating Officer, overseeing global oil and gas operations, low-carbon integrated technologies and the midstream and marketing and health, safety and environment functions. He will continue reporting to Vicki Hollub, President and Chief Executive Officer. Jackson was named Senior Vice President and President, U.S. Onshor

content.title: Occidental Promotes Richard A. Jackson to Senior Vice President and Chief Operating Officer
content.summary: HOUSTON, Oct. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Occidental (NYSE: OXY) announced today that its Board of Directors has promoted Richard A. Jackson to Senior Vice President and Chief Operating Officer, overseeing global oil and gas operations, low-carbon integrated technologies and the midstream and marketing and health, safety and environment functions. He will continue reporting to Vicki Hollub, President and Chief Executive Officer. Jackson was named Senior Vice President and President, U.S. Onshor

headline: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. to Acquire OxyChem
summary: OMAHA, Neb. & HOUSTON, October 02, 2025--Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK) and Occidental (NYSE: OXY) today announced a definitive agreement for Berkshire Hathaway to acquire Occidental’s chemical business, OxyChem, in an all-cash transaction for $9.7 billion, subject to customary purchase price adjustments. OxyChem is a global manufacturer of commodity chemicals vital to quality of life, with applications in water treatment, pharmaceuticals, healthcare and commercial and residential development.

content.title: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. to Acquire OxyChem
content.summary: OMAHA, Neb. & HOUSTON, October 02, 2025--Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK) and Occidental (NYSE: OXY) today announced a definitive agreement for Berkshire Hathaway to acquire Occidental’s chemical business, OxyChem, in an all-cash transaction for $9.7 billion, subject to customary purchase price adjustments. OxyChem is a global manufacturer of commodity chemicals vital to quality of life, with applications in water treatment, pharmaceuticals, healthcare and commercial and residential development.
